components.label: 1. Canadian Residency
components.description: What is your residency status on the first day of class?
components.tooltip: Did you know, You must meet Canadian Residency requirements to receive funding through StudentAid BC. TEST TEST TEST

components.label: 2. BC Residency
components.description: Have you lived in B.C. for at least 12 consecutive months without being a full-time post-secondary student
components.tooltip: Did you know, You must meet B.C. residency requirements to receive funding through StudentAid BC

components.label: 3. Bankruptcy
components.description: Have you ever declared bankruptcy that included financial assistance?
components.tooltip: StudentAid BC requires that applicants have not previously declared bankruptcy.

components.label: 4. Date of High School Attendance
components.description: What is the date that you graducated high school?
components.tooltip: Please enter the date when you graduated or when you orginally left highschool before coming back to graduate

components.label: 5. Dependents
components.tooltip: A dependant is classified as: something

components.label: Institution
components.placeholder: Select the institution that you are planning to attend

components.label: Available Programs
components.placeholder: Select the program that you are planning to take

components.label: 1. Previous Years Income Tax Return
components.description: Did you file a tax return last year?

components.label: 2020 Tax Return Income
components.description: In 2020 what was your income on line 15000 of your tax return

components.label: Estimated Income
components.description: Since unable to provide previous years tax return you are required to estimate your income for this year
components.tooltip: To Estimate your income please follow this link: Google.ca

components.label: 2. Living Situation and Travel Costs
components.description: While you are in school, will you be living with your parent(s)/step-parent/sponsor/legal guardian or living in a home owned or rented by them?

components.label: Relocation
components.description: Will you be relocating to a different city to attend school and returning home atleast once during your study period?

components.label: What is the cost of one return trip home?

components.html:
For the purpose of verifying the data provided in this application for student assistance, I hereby consent to the release, by the Canada Revenue Agency, to the Ministry of Advanced Education, Skills and Training (or a person delegated by the ministry), of taxpayer information from any portion of my income tax records that pertains to information given by me on any StudentAid BC application.

The information will be relevant to, and used solely for the purpose of determining and verifying my information and for my spouse’s eligibility for and entitlement to the following programs: Canada Student Grant for students with Permanent Disabilities, the BC Supplemental Bursary for Students with a Permanent Disability, Canada Student Grant for Part-time Students, Canada Student Loan for Part-time Studies, and if eligible, Canada Student Grant for Part-time Students with Dependants under the Canada Student Financial Assistance Act.

This information will not be disclosed to any other person or organization without my prior approval. This authorization is valid for the two taxation years prior to the year of signature of this consent, the year of signature of this consent and for any other subsequent consecutive taxation year for which assistance is requested.
components.label: CANADA REVENUE AGENCY CONSENT
I give the Canadian Revenue Agency consent to verify the data I have provided in my application.
